name: Space Escape (Shushidev)
description:
Try to get the highest score! Click the trophy in the death screen to enter your name and see if you made it on the leaderboard!

Programmer: Shushidev (https://shushidev.itch.io/)

Artist: DuckLADY (https://duck-e.itch.io/)

Please play the downloadable version, I have set the web browser version to private due to too many bugs.

A simple endless space game where you play as a spaceship and have to dodge meteors while entering the correct portal to teleport you to the next safe location.

Made for SCORESPACE JAM #11

Used Assets:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/fantasy-sfx-for-parti...
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/powerup-particles-16458
